ancestry.name: Gnoll
languages: Additional languages equal to your Intelligence modifier (if it's positive). Choose from {@language Draconic}, {@language Elven}, {@language Iruxi|b1}, {@language Necril}, {@language Orcish}, {@language Sylvan}, and any other languages to which you have access (such as the languages prevalent in your region).

features.name: Bite
entries: Your sharp teeth and powerful jaws are fearsome weapons. You have a jaws unarmed attack that deals {@dice 1d6} piercing damage. Your jaws are in the {@group brawling} group.

features.name: Low-Light Vision
entries: You can see in dim light as though it were bright light, and you ignore the {@condition concealed} condition due to dim light.
Powerfully-built humanoids that resemble hyenas, gnolls are cunning warriors and hunters. Their frightening visage and efficient tactics have given them an ill-starred reputation.

heritage.name: Ant Gnoll
entries: You're a sharp-featured, big-eared gnoll about three feet tall. Many are skeptical that you are in fact a gnoll. Your size is {@trait Small} instead of {@trait Medium}. You are trained in {@skill Deception} (or another skill if you were already trained in {@skill Deception}). You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to {@skill Deception} checks to {@action Lie} when specifically claiming innocence, to {@skill Deception} DCs against {@action Sense Motive} checks to uncover such lies, and to initiative checks when you roll {@skill Deception} for initiative.

heritage.name: Great Gnoll
entries: You're a large, powerful gnoll, with tawny fur and brown spots on your hide. You gain 10 Hit Points from your ancestry instead of 8 and gain a +1 circumstance bonus to {@skill Athletics} checks to {@action Shove} or {@action Trip} foes.

heritage.name: Sweetbreath Gnoll
entries: You're a striped, pale-furred gnoll with oddly pleasant breath, which you can use to entrance your prey. You are trained in {@skill Diplomacy} (or another skill if you were already trained in {@skill Diplomacy}). You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks to {@spell Make an Impression} if the target can smell your breath.

heritage.name: Witch Gnoll
entries: You're a shaggy, dark-furred gnoll capable of making some truly uncanny sounds. You can cast the {@spell ghost sound} cantrip as an occult innate spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up. In addition, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks to {@action Impersonate} and {@action Create a Diversion} when using only your voice.
